attributes.action: Full National Public Enquiry into the (National) Rape Grooming Gangs.
attributes.additional_details: Justice, closure for victims, safety, and prevention not to mention 'Just The Right Thing To Do!'
attributes.background:
Have an in-depth and full public enquiry into the gang rape grooming across the UK.
We must catch more than the low-hanging fruit, all implicit to it. It is time to target the hierarchy and the complicit people in this horrific and most gross crime of the 21st century in the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
